'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
The foundations of the Maw go deep below the Keep, directly into the volcanic rock and the lifeblood of the Earth. [[Eothas]] is here now, siphoning the energy of the luminous adra pillar at the heart of Magran's Teeth.

==Points of interest==
* This is a vista, giving you a close look at Eothas. To progress, simply approach him and start buzzing near his ears.
title: Foundations of the Ashen Maw
